snippet: A roundup of so-called god games, which let you control the world.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column rounds up mobile games that allow users to control entire worlds; recommends Camera51 photo app for Android phones.
lead_paragraph: A roundup of so-called god games, which let you control the world.

headline.print_headline: Unleashing Your Inner Benevolent Creator — or Wrathful Deity
headline.main: With Mobile ‘God Games,’ Unleash Your Inner Benevolent Creator — or Wrathful Deity
